title: New Season New Home @Heritage Glen
posting_body: ['HELLO!!!!', 'My name is Jennifer and I would love to get you in a new home as soon as possible!', 'Blow is a list of our current prices for both of our properties', 'Other units currently available at Westminster Park:', '• 1 Bedroom, 604 Sq.', 'Ft - 1 Bath Apt.', 'Home- $950.00', '• 2 Bedroom, 815 Sq.', 'Ft. -1.5 Bath Townhome- $1100.00', '• 3 Bedroom, 994 Sq.', 'Ft. -1.5 Bath Townhome- $1295.00', 'Other units currently available at Heritage Glen:', '• 1 Bedroom, 1100 Sq.', 'Ft.-1', 'Bath Townhome- $1025.00', '• 2 Bedroom, 1200 Sq.', 'Ft.- 1.5 Bath Townhome- $1150.00', '• 3 Bedroom, 1435 Sq.', 'Ft. - 1.5 Bath Townhome- $1275.00', '• 3 Bedroom, 1600 Sq.', 'Ft. -1.5 Bath Townhome- $1375.00', 'In order to qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior evictions or monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.', 'We also ask for your most recent paystubs at least 4, a copy of your social security card and ID.', 'Application fees are $50.00 per adult', 'If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9-6PM and Sat.', 'from 9am-4pm.', 'Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication.', 'PLEASE READ CAREFULLY!!!!', 'PRICES AND AVAILABILTY ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE!!!', 'ALL SECURITY DEPOSITS ARE NON-REFUNDABLE ONCE YOU PUT ONE DOWN!!!!', 'Virtual Tours Available on Apartments .', 'com!']
